ibis.io
Class BufferedArrayOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      ibis.io.DataOutputStream
          ibis.io.BufferedArrayOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, DataOutput, Closeable, Flushable
public final class BufferedArrayOutputStream
extends DataOutputStream
implements Constants

This is a complete implementation of DataOutputStream. It is built on top of an OutputStream. There is no need to put any buffering inbetween. This implementation does all the buffering needed.

bytesWritten

public long bytesWritten()
Description copied from class: DataOutputStream
Returns the number of bytes that was written to the stream, in the stream dependant format. This is the number of bytes that will be sent over the network.

Specified by:
